revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #42 Kebia |image = [[File:Kebia.png]] |caption = This Berry is a brilliant green on the outside. Inside, it is packed with a dry-flavored, black-colored flesh. It has a tendency to overtake nearby plants. Due to its poisonous nature, it increases the chances of mutations near it. |growtime = 10m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 100% |points = 50 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Kebia''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by planting [[Pamtre]] and equipping the [[Poison Barb]]. The [[Pamtre]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 min 40 secs || 3 mins 20 secs || 6 mins 40 secs || 10 mins - 24 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (mutation chance) | ||
x1.2 ||
x1.4 ||
x1.6 |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kebia berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Pamtre.png|30px]]
